title: Convinced: Why Would Anyone Become Catholic? (2015)
description:
Convinced: Why Would Anyone Become Catholic? (2015)

Why would intelligent, successful people give up careers, alienate friends, and cause havoc in their familiesâ€¦to become Catholic? As he was considering his own journey into the Church, Donald Johnson traveled around the country to find out, visiting with some of our cultureâ€™s most interesting and articulate Catholic personalities.

Convinced follows the story of several well known converts to Catholicism as they move from skepticism to belief. Interviees include Jennifer Fulwiler, Abby Johnson, Holly Ordway, Devin Rose, Mark Shea, Leah Libresco, Scott Hahn, Matthew Leonard, Taylor Marshall, and many more.

If you enjoy this media, please purchase a physical copy to support the producers and share with family and friends.
